price: 106. Moto oyo akopengwa na Allah sima ya bondimi naye longola sé oyo bakangi ye na makasi été apengwa kasi motema naye ezali na kimia ya bondimi, kasi baye bakomipesa na bopengwi, kanda ya Allah ezali likolo na bango mpe bakozala na etumbu enene.
arabic: مَن كَفَرَ بِٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ إِيمَٰنِهِۦٓ إِلَّا مَنۡ أُكۡرِهَ وَقَلۡبُهُۥ مُطۡمَئِنُّۢ بِٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ وَلَٰكِن مَّن شَرَحَ بِٱلۡكُفۡرِ صَدۡرٗا فَعَلَيۡهِمۡ غَضَبٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
